程序包 ride

类 User

  • java.lang.Object
    • ride.User
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Observer
    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    a user can hold a card and rent bike.
    作者:
    Zhihao Li

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      User()
      a default constructor
      User​(java.lang.String name)
      a user with given name

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void addCard​(Card card)
      to set a card to the user
      void displayStat()
      to display user's information(like toString)
      Card getCard()  
      java.lang.String getName()  
      double getTotalCharge()  
      int getTotalRides()  
      double getTotalRidingTimeInMIn()  
      int getUserId()  
      boolean isRiding()  
      boolean isWithCard()  
      void payFor​(OngoingRide ride)
      user pay for a ride and get related information noted down
      void setRiding​(boolean riding)  
      void setTotalRides​(int totalRides)  
      java.lang.String toString()
      override toString method of user
      void update​(Station station)
      observer pattern, user is an observer to be notified with returnability of told end station
      void updateStatistic​(Record record)
      to record ride times and duration of the user after a riding, and give 5 minutes time credit to him if bike is returned to a plus station

        public void addCard​(Card card)
        to set a card to the user
        参数:

      • updateStatistic

        public void updateStatistic​(Record record)
        to record ride times and duration of the user after a riding, and give 5 minutes time credit to him if bike is returned to a plus station
        参数:
        record - a riding record

      • update

        public void update​(Station station)
        observer pattern, user is an observer to be notified with returnability of told end station
        指定者:
        update 在接口中 Observer

      • displayStat

        public void displayStat()
        to display user's information(like toString)

      • payFor

        public void payFor​(OngoingRide ride)
        user pay for a ride and get related information noted down
        参数:
        ride - a ride to be charged
